summary: Create a simple, easy-to-use landing webpage for a cricket auction/bidding platform called BidArena.

existing_features.title: Create a simple, single-page landing page for a cricket auction/bidding platform with the brand name "BidArena" displayed at the top alongside a logo.
Add a "How to use" section with simple, English instructions describing how users can participate in bidding on BidArena.
Add a primary call-to-action button labeled "Start Bidding" that clearly initiates the next step (e.g., scrolls to the rates/pricing section or opens a simple modal explaining next steps).
Add a reviews/testimonials slideshow (carousel) section that cycles through multiple user reviews with simple controls.

Add a "Rates" section showing rates for different combinations of teams in a simple table or card layout; if exact rates are not provided, display clearly editable placeholder rates such as "Contact for pricing" per combination.
Add a "Contact" section that displays contact information (e.g., email/phone) using clearly editable placeholders if real details are not provided.

Apply a coherent, creative visual theme across the landing page (colors, typography, spacing, and section styling) appropriate for a cricket auction/bidding brand, avoiding a blue/purple default palette.
Add the generated BidArena logo asset to the frontend static assets and use it in the header/hero area (do not serve images via the backend).
Replace the currently used BidArena logo image with the user-provided logo asset, ensuring the updated logo appears everywhere the logo is rendered (at minimum: the header logo and the footer logo).

new_feature_requests.summary: Landing page header with BidArena logo and name at the top
Section with simple 'How to use' instructions
Replace the generated BidArena logo with the user-provided logo asset
